shear_stress_distribution_cross_sections.description: Two cross-sectional diagrams showing shear stress distribution: left shows I-beam cross-section with arrows indicating shear flow, right shows elliptical/oval cross-section with Hz label and directional arrow

multicell_beam_section_with_stringer.png.description: Multi-cell stringer-stiffened beam section showing spar cap, shear web, and stringer with internal moment Mz and torque T labels

thin_walled_beam_internal_forces.png.description: Thin-walled beam cross-section showing internal forces Tx, Ty and torsional moment Mz with coordinate system

beam_section_arbitrary_region.png.description: Rectangular beam cross-section with arbitrary region A' marked showing coordinate system for shear flow analysis

i_beam_shear_flow_source_sink.png.description: I-beam cross-section showing shear flow patterns with arrows indicating source and sink regions, demonstrating positive and negative flow directions

internal_forces_moments_3d_diagram.png.description: 3D coordinate system diagram showing internal forces Tx, Ty and moments Mx, My, Mz with directional arrows and relationships between components

i_beam_thin_web_shear_distribution.png.description: I-beam cross-section showing thin web assumption with shear web and internal shear force Ty, illustrating stress distribution along web

shear_flow_distribution_patterns.png.description: I-beam section showing constant and quadratic shear flow distribution patterns along web height with coordinate system and thickness parameter

lumped_area_beam_model.png.description: I-beam cross-section with lumped areas A1 and A2 showing concentrated area representation and shear web with no area designation

constant_shear_flow_approximation.png.description: I-beam section showing shear flow distribution with lumped areas A1 and A2, illustrating constant shear flow approximation and exact versus approximate flow diagrams

wing_box_idealization_transformation.png.description: Two-cell wing-box structure transformation showing actual structure with ribs converting to idealized model with concentrated nodes

wing_structure_ribs_3d_view.png.description: 3D perspective view of wing structure showing ribs as stiffening elements with arrows indicating in-plane and out-of-plane directions

stringer_lumping_transformation.png.description: Stringer lumping diagram showing transformation from distributed stringers with spacing L to lumped concentrated areas with equivalent area calculation

panel_stress_distribution_diagram.png.description: Panel stress diagram showing thickness t, coordinate s, and stress distribution with assumption of constant stress in thickness-wise direction

stringer_lumping_comparison.png.description: Comparison diagrams showing actual stringer shape with distances d1 and neutral axis versus lumped representation with distance d2

section_types_classification.png.description: Classification of beam sections showing three types: open section, single-cell closed section, and multi-cell closed section with example cross-sections

panel_resultant_flow_diagram.png.description: Panel resultant flow diagram showing curved panel from point A to B with resultant force R_r, projection h_r, and geometric relationships

curved_panel_geometry_diagram.png.description: Geometric diagram showing curved panel segment with angle beta, incremental length ds, projection relationships and resultant force calculation

moment_calculation_curved_panel.png.description: Moment calculation diagram showing curved panel from A to B with point P, arm distance d, infinitesimal area elements and moment contribution geometry

section_symmetry_principal_axes.png.description: Symmetry diagrams showing rectangular and triangular sections with principal axes, demonstrating transformation to principal coordinate system with single angle of symmetry

asymmetric_section_principal_axes.png.description: Asymmetric quadrilateral section showing centroid location, principal axes determination with moments of inertia and rotation angle alpha calculation

generic_section_shear_flow_equilibrium.p.description: Generic section and specific region A' showing shear flow application with flow values q1, q2, q3 and equilibrium equation demonstration

infinitesimal_element_equilibrium_3d.png.description: 3D equilibrium diagram showing infinitesimal beam element with shear flows q1, q2, q3, forces and incremental changes along z-axis

open_section_shear_flows.png.description: Open C-section diagram showing three unknown shear flows q1, q2, q3 with linearly independent shear flow equations for n=4 stringers

closed_section_circulating_flow.png.description: Single-cell closed rectangular section showing shear flows q1, q2, q3, q4 with circulating flow q* and missing equation discussion

closed_section_torsional_moment.png.description: Rectangular closed section showing internal torsional moment Hz with shear flows and equivalence condition equation

c_section_principal_axes.png.description: C-section with principal axes showing dimensions a and b, internal forces Tx and Ty, and coordinate system for open section analysis

alternative_integration_paths.png.description: Alternative path diagrams showing four different integration paths A1, A2, A3, A4 for applying shear flow equations with equivalent results

shear_center_position_diagram.png.description: Rectangular section showing shear center position with internal forces Tx, Ty, moment Hz, and geometric dimensions a and b for equilibrium

shear_center_graphical_representation.pn.description: Graphical representation showing all curves passing through shear center point (x_sc, y_sc) with slope dependent on Ty/Tx ratio

shear_center_force_ratio_diagrams.png.description: Two diagrams showing rectangular sections with different Ty/Tx ratios: one with Ty shifted along r-axis, another with both Tx and Ty showing elastic axis

single_cell_closed_section.png.description: Generic rectangular closed section with one cell showing internal forces Tx, Ty, torsional moment Hz and coordinate system for single-cell analysis

cut_panel_flow_distribution.png.description: Rectangular section showing cut panel with flows q'1 through q'6, illustrating flow distribution after cutting one panel with q'6=0

circulating_flow_moment_equivalence.png.description: Closed section with circulating flow q* showing areas Ω1, Ω2, Ω3 and equivalence to internal moment with respect to arbitrary point P

torsion_evaluation_real_dummy_systems.pn.description: 3D diagram showing two-cell section with infinitesimal portion dz, illustrating real and dummy systems for torsion evaluation with rotation angles

cell_shear_flow_summation.png.description: Rectangular section diagram showing shear flow Sq with cell area notation and summation over panels for single cell k

multicell_section_equation_count.png.description: Multi-cell section example showing n=8 stringers, m=10 panels, N=3 cells with equation count: n-1 shear flow equations and 1 equivalence condition

multicell_solution_procedure.png.description: Solution procedure diagram showing N panels cut with shear flow equations and equivalence conditions for multi-cell closed sections

multicell_shear_center_position.png.description: Rectangular section showing shear center position y_sc with internal force Tx and coordinate system for multi-cell section analysis

single_cell_shear_center.png.description: Single-cell rectangular section showing shear center x_sc position with internal force Ty and principal axes for closed section

centroid_shear_center_offset.png.description: Asymmetric section showing centroid CG and shear center SC with coordinate systems, illustrating non-coincident centers and reference system through shear center

bending_stiffness_principal_axes.png.description: Rectangular section with coordinate systems showing principal axes and bending stiffness relationships EJ_xx and EJ_yy with distances from principal axes

cantilever_beam_compact_section.png.description: Cantilever beam diagram showing compact square section with dimension a, length l, applied force F at free end, and internal forces Mx, Ty with coordinate system

thin_walled_square_section.png.description: Thin-walled square section with dimension a and thickness t showing area and thickness properties for shear deformability comparison

rectangular_section_torsional_stiffness..description: Rectangular beam section with dimensions a and b showing constant thickness t and coordinate system for torsional stiffness calculation

shear_area_web_contribution.png.description: Rectangular section showing shear area A_y with web area designation and symmetry-based shear flow distribution with forces STy/2a at corners
